Text: We would all be better off if the loons were locked up and getting treatment if they like it or not....than we are now with them running loose causing all sorts of problems and crimes.

@loonleeks - You can get the image to appear on the listing by clicking on "settings" on the bayimg page, choosing "resize", then submitting. When the page refeshes, select and copy the long string of digits/letters which is the TPB imagetag. Then go back and paste that in the imagetag field on tpb's upload page.

Thanks Pharmakate I'll remember that for the next one.
And Wow have you got some  good stuff in line with my interests! I'm gonna be busy for a while.
